message: Hi Bob, I'm selling a product that I believe will be of great value to you. I'm offering it to you for $15000. Let me know your thoughts!
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I understand the value of the product might be high to you, but I am only willing to pay up to $8000 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.

Bob, I appreciate your interest in the product. While I understand your budget, $8000 is unfortunately too low for me.  I'm willing to come down to $12000, which still gives you a significant value for the product.  I'm confident this price reflects a fair deal for both of us. Let me know your thoughts.

Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Based on my assessment of the product's value, I would like to propose a price of $9500. This still allows me to stay within my budget while ensuring a fair deal for you. I look forward to your response.
